description:
In a crumbling village, one of Almayce`s underlings takes on Lina`s crew - and somehow ends up becoming a hero to the townsfolk!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Hero`s Advent? For Whom Does the Young Girl Pray?
L`arrivée du héros ? Pour qui est la prière de la fillette ?
Yuusha Kourin? Shoujo no Inori wa Dare no Tame?
Пришествие героя? За кого молится девушка?
勇者降臨? 少女の祈りは誰のため?
